All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
Represents an admin user in the library system.
AdminManager
This class manages the list of administrators in the library system.
App
JavaFX App
AppState
This class represents the application's state.
Book
Represents a book in a library system.
BookController
A controller for managing book-related operations in the library application.
BookManager
This class manages the list of books in the library system.
BookService
This class provides services for managing books in the library system.
Comment
Represents a comment in a library system.
CommentsBook
A controller for displaying comments related to a specific book in the library application.
DeleteLoanService
A class that provides different services for deleting loans and books from the library system based on the use cases.
DetailsBook
 
DetailsBookAdmin
A controller for desplaying the details of a book to the admin and allowing him to edit them.
DetailsUserController
A controller for displaying the details of a user in the library application and allowing the admin to edit them.
Loan
Represents a loan record in a library system.
LoanController
A controller for the user to manage his loans in the library application.
LoanControllerAdmin
A controller for managing loans in the library application.
LoanManager
This class manages the list of loans in the library system.
LoanService
A service for managing loans in the library system.
LoginController
A controller for managing the login screen in the library application.
PrimaryController
A controller serving as the admin dashboard.
RateCommentBookController
A controller for managing the rating and commenting functionality for a book in the library application.
SecondaryController
A controller for managing the users of the system.
SerializationService
A service for serializing and deserializing objects using Java serialization.
SerializationServiceInterface
An interface for serializing and deserializing objects using Java serialization.
SessionLoginCheckService
A service for checking user and admin login credentials and managing the session in a JavaFX application.
SessionManager
This class manages the user and admin that are currently logged in the library system.
ShowAlertService
A service for displaying custom alerts in a JavaFX application.
SignupController
A controller for managing the user signup functionality in the library application.
StartController
A controller for managing the start screen in the library application.
User
Represents a user in the library system.
UserDeletionService
A service for deleting users and their associated loans from the library system.
UserManager
This class manages the list of users in the library system.
UserService
A class providing services for managing users in the library system.
UserStartController
A controller for managing the start screen after a successgul user login.
